Topstartup

I'll be attending ROFLcon

... because entrepreneurs need to have fun too! ROFLcon is a conference all about internet culture and memes. Last night I cracked. I bit the bullet and signed up while at a bar on my iPhone. If you have no idea about these types of things, you've probably missed out on the following:

  • Homestar Runner
  • Marmaduke Explained
  • George Washington
  • I can has cheeseburger

There are these and so much more at ROFLcon. I am excited. The only thing I am disappointed about is the creator of goatse won't be there anymore. He seems to have disappeared from the list :(.
